name: Skyward Shoots
description:
In Skyward Shoots, you are an ambitious seed determined to reach the sky. Bloom, gather water and avoid obstacles to get as high as possible before running out of water.

How to Play

  • Use your mouse to control the sun and guide the flower
  • Make sure it won't run out of water by collecting watering cans
  • Avoid anything that might get in the way of it's growth!
  • Once it loses all its petals, it's game over

Credits

  • Sam McCreery - Programmer
  • Jess McCreery - Programmer
  • Jamie Sparrow (Jamma) - Artiste
  • Richard Williams (Lime) - Composer
